transArray.content: There are quite a lot of breakfast options and there is no room for an extra bed.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to know from your review that this hotel left a good impression on you. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets before disinfecting and cleaning. There are standardized service procedures at every step. Please feel free to check in. . Breakfast has now returned to buffet style, and the menu items are updated from time to time to provide you with nutrition and taste bud enjoyment. The room facilities are being gradually updated to provide you with a more ideal stay experience as soon as possible. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
